name: Astral Fantasy
description:
THE FINAL FRONTIER

Use orbital physics to navigate the galaxy, defeat space pirates, and level up your party.

LD41 THEME: "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

Timelapse Video

Featuring:

  • Three fighters, three weapons each
  • Generous EXP rewards
  • The vacuum of space

Controls:

  • MOUSE - Drag View / Select
  • WSAD - Turn / Thrust
  • SPACEBAR - Attack
  • TAB - Skip
